title: The Happy Cow 3 Pack of Moisturizing Udder Balm, 12 Ounces each, Pump Lid Jars
description: Soothes rough, itchy, tired and cracked skin. Softens hands, cuticles, legs, hands, feet heels, arms & elbows! Aids in the protection against the effects associated with extremes in weather or low humidity, and warm and cold temperatures. Gentle lemon fragrance. Wonderful non-greasy feel that absorbs quickly into the skin. Formulated with vitamin A, D & E, aloe vera gel and lanolin. Daily Application aids in soothing and softening rough, scaly skin. A balm has a denser consistency and is designed not only to hydrate the skin but to also treat and repair dry skin such as hands, joint areas and feet. A balm helps to repair, protect and nourish the skin.

title: Product Review: Original Udder Balm Body Moisturizing Cream
Best Non-greasy Handcream for Dry Hands
I got super dry sensitive skin, lucky for me I found this!
